titles.title: Don't Turn Back, Children Of Israel

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Don't turn back, children of Israel, don't turn back.
Don't turn back, children of Israel, don't turn back.
For the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
Don't turn back, children of Israel, don't turn back.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You're My people children of Israel, you're My people. (2x)
For the kingdom of heaven is at hands.
You're My people children of Israel, you're My people.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Stand on the promise, etc.
Stand in the man, etc.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
No volved atrás, Israel, no volved atrás.
Porque el Reino de Dios ya está
No volved atrás, Israel no volved atrás.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
/Seguid andando, Israel seguid andando/ (2)
Porque el Reino de Dios ya está
seguid andando, Israel seguid andando.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Seguid marchando...
Estad en la promesa...
